unnormalised: Okay, so someone's asking about "EduID" and "EmpID" - sounds like alphabet soup, right? Well, EduID is basically your school/college's way of tracking you. Think of it as your digital hall pass. Mine was something super creative like "IITB/2018/CS/042" - felt like I won the lottery! It’s used for everything from exam registrations to accessing online resources, so keep it safe. Losing it is like losing your digital soul (okay, maybe not THAT dramatic, but still annoying).
normalised: Okay, so someone's asking about "E-d-u-I-D" and "E-m-p-I-D" - sounds like alphabet soup, right? Well, E-d-u-I-D is basically your school slash college's way of tracking you. Think of it as your digital hall pass. Mine was something super creative like "I-I-T-B slash two thousand and eighteen slash C-S slash zero forty two" - felt like I won the lottery! It's used for everything from exam registrations to accessing online resources, so keep it safe. Losing it is like losing your digital soul (okay, maybe not that dramatic, but still annoying).

unnormalised: Now, EmpID is your company's way of knowing you're not just some random person wandering around the office. Mine at TCS started with "CT" followed by a bunch of random numbers, probably based on the year they hired my batch or something. They use it for payroll, attendance, claiming expenses… you know, all the fun, grown-up stuff. Treat it like your bank account number – sensitive info, and probably linked to your salary, so don't go shouting it from the rooftops!
normalised: Now, E-m-p-I-D is your company's way of knowing you're not just some random person wandering around the office. Mine at T-C-S started with "C-T" followed by a bunch of random numbers, probably based on the year they hired my batch or something. They use it for payroll, attendance, claiming expenses… you know, all the fun, grown-up stuff. Treat it like your bank account number – sensitive info, and probably linked to your salary, so don't go shouting it from the rooftops!

unnormalised: Basically, EduID gets you through college with minimal existential crises, and EmpID gets you paid (hopefully on time!). Both are equally important and equally forgettable once you move on to the next stage of life. Just remember, if anyone asks for both at the same time, run. Run far, far away. They're probably trying to steal your identity or, worse, assign you extra work. *shudders*
normalised: Basically, E-d-u-I-D gets you through college with minimal existential crises, and E-m-p-I-D gets you paid (hopefully on time!). Both are equally important and equally forgettable once you move on to the next stage of life. Just remember, if anyone asks for both at the same time, run. Run far, far away. They're probably trying to steal your identity or, worse, assign you extra work. *shudders*
